channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fire risk obstruction from emergency exit, 6th November
item.description:
Fire risk in alley as fly tipping and cardboard and wood being dumped down alleyway obstructing our emergency exit’s from our properties
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belmont Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress and rubbish Bloomfield Road, 6th November
item.description:
Mattress and rubbish being dumped on corner of Bloomfield Road and Fredrick Place. The property others corner is in a bad state of repair. Broken windows that’s can’t close, etc.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Frederick Place, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chippenham Gardens (Stop MU) bus stop, 6th November
item.description:
Someone has written on the bus stop poster to show support for Palestine Action, a proscribed terrorist organisation.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Malvern Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hearn Street lined with litter for months, 6th November
item.description:
Hearn St along Blok has been filled with litter all along benches and behind them for months

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hearn Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Standby side of the pub opposite the train station, 6th November
item.description:
Someone has dumped the household rubbish and they are rats running round

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cambridge Gardens, London

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Bus Stop H countdown still out of order, 6th November
item.description:
This stop hasn’t had live information reliable for weeks on end now!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wandsworth Road, Vauxhall, London

item.title: First light on the left as you enter Ling Road, 6th November
item.description:
Light has been out for a number of months now causing a dark spot on the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 155, Ling Road, Northumberland Heath, London

item.title: Dangerous reinstatement of the footway, 6th November
item.description:
Shockingly bad reinstatement of the footway. Uneven, bits missing and lethal in the dark. I fell over on it and now have cuts and bruises on my leg and hands. This is dangerous and needs sorting ASAP.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 94, Woodfall Road, Finsbury Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over hanging branches, 6th November
item.description:
Large trees need trimming back branches overhanging into the gardens of abbey mount court ave .not a orbit issue also blocking light .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Mount, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Inadequate pen pushers, 6th November
item.description:
Your noise pollution reporting method is a joke. Does anyone actually look at these reported problems or are they busy sleeping. It's no wonder people don't want to pay council tax when the service is awful.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cranwich Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Parking on pavement, 6th November
item.description:
Cars parking on pavement damage the pavement and it becomes a risk for anybody walking. Also blind people do not expect to find a car parked in the middle of a pavement so please enforce the pavement parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Road, Whetstone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
